data.name: UnauthorizedAccess
data.value: Unauthorized access!
data.comment: Unauthorized access!

data.name: Email_Required
data.value: Email is required.
data.comment: Email must not be empty.

data.name: Email_Invalid
data.value: Invalid email format.
data.comment: Email must be in a valid format (e.g., user@example.com).

data.name: PhoneNumber_Required
data.value: Phone number is required.
data.comment: Phone number must not be empty.

data.name: PhoneNumber_Invalid
data.value: Phone number must contain digits only.
data.comment: Phone number cannot include + or 00 prefix.

data.name: DialCode_Required
data.value: Dial code is required.
data.comment: Dial code must not be empty.

data.name: DialCode_Invalid
data.value: Dial code must start with '+' followed by digits.
data.comment: Dial code must be a valid international dialing code.

data.name: Password_Required
data.value: Password is required.
data.comment: Password must not be empty.

data.name: Password_Invalid
data.value: Password must be at least 6 characters, include uppercase, number, and special character.
data.comment: Password must meet complexity rules.

data.name: Email_AlreadyExists
data.value: Email is already registered.
data.comment: Returned when trying to register with an existing email.

data.name: PhoneNumber_AlreadyExists
data.value: Phone number is already registered.
data.comment: Returned when trying to register with an existing phone number.

data.name: Email_NotVerified
data.value: Email exists but is not verified. Please verify your email.
data.comment: Returned when user email exists but is not verified.

data.name: PhoneNumber_NotVerified
data.value: Phone number exists but is not verified. Please verify your phone number.
data.comment: Returned when user phone number exists but is not verified.

data.name: OTPNotSendToEmail
data.value: Something went wrong while trying to send the one-time code to your email. Please try again later.
data.comment: Something went wrong while trying to send the one-time code to your email. Please try again later.

data.name: OTPNotSendToPhone
data.value: Failed to send the one-time code to your phone.
data.comment: Failed to send the one-time code to your phone.

data.name: OneTimeCodeToEmail
data.value: We have sent a one-time code to your email. Please check and verify your email address.
data.comment: We have sent a one-time code to your email. Please check and verify your email address.

data.name: OneTimeCodeToPhone
data.value: One-time code has been sent to your phone.
data.comment: One-time code has been sent to your phone.
